name: Tinbot Tussle - Global Jam 2020
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Rivet tinbots together with the correct pieces to defend yourself against stuffed animals! 

CONTROLS
Mouse movement and clicking only.

CREDITS

Parker Derrick - Art, Design
